funFacts.title: Decoding Al Bhed in FFX
funFacts.description: In Final Fantasy X, collecting all 26 Al Bhed Primers transforms conversations into English. It's like unlocking a secret language. Players often share tips on finding these Primers, especially the elusive ones, enhancing their game translation experience.

funFacts.title: Al Bhed's Language Twist
funFacts.description: Al Bhed isn't a real language but a fun cipher. It swaps English letters with a fixed pattern, making translation a breeze. Surprisingly, fans have created complete number systems and punctuation, giving it a unique twist in the gaming world.
